choice_text 1 "What can you tell me about NLU?"
"Looks like this is an old speakeasy of the club, but it has since
been converted into a hideout of sorts..."
"I'm pretty new recruit of the group, so I don't really know too
much and frankly I'm not very comfortable in telling much either..."
"We are just trying to tilt the balance of the war to Allied's
favour by doing miscellaneous tasks and strikes behind the enemy
"This place is one of our hideouts... There was something big going
on here... But I'm as clueless as you on what that exactly means."
"Some kind of revolutionaries I think. They were clearly against both
the Bremen militia and Eastern Union that used to occupy this area
"...I mean from the looks of things at least."
"Or I don't know... What do you think?"
"There are some technical drawings here and there, but the technology
"I'm not actually sure about what they are depicting."
"That map over there is showing certain locations. I think one of
the locations is that tunnel we already visited."
"Whatever is going on here has something to do with those tunnels."
"Usually if I have a problem in front of me, I act, and fix the
"There is something very weird going on here."
"How can you act or do anything, when you don't even understand
"This place works as a nice center hub for the city, right?"
"I've always liked the club atmosphere. The air filled with tobacco
smoke, the chattering of people, mellow jazz and tinkle of cocktail
"That mixed with a secret hideout. What could be better?"
"No use sitting on my behind all day."
"The party's pretty crowded already. Maybe some other time?"
\c[1]"Everything is so cryptic... Tunnels are used to connect some

A pile of flesh remains here with a \c[2]Brain flower\c[0]
A pile of flesh remains here with a \c[2]Heart flower\c[0]
A pile of flesh remains here...
"I'm going to check it out. Give me a sec."
"It's obviously more than just an old stash where they hid their
"I hit the jackpot with this hideout!"
"What do you think about this place?"
"What do you think is happening in the city?"
"What do you think about this place?"
"This place... is a hideout... of NLU."
"I had completely neglected the possibility of NLU's presence!
"Nameless Liberty Underground. They're this small rebel group
that has been doing guerilla strikes against Bremen and Eastern
"I've ran into that name multiple times during the past few years."
"The group is aligned with the Allied countries, right Abella?"
"Does it matter? I'm asking, you answer."
"Ja, you got me. I'm part of the NLU."
"We have operation in Rondon, Charmagne-Lombard, Valland and
Oldegrd... At least as far as I know."
"I'm not exactly high in ranks and thus I only have the information
"For safety reasons of course. If one of us was caught. We can't
"What do you know about this place?"
"I was supposed to meet a contact person in Prehevil, but that never
"It's pretty embarrassing how little I actually know. Only that
something big is happening here, and it has something to do with
"Well maybe we'll find a lead here."
"What do you think is happening in the city?"
"I'm leaning towards the army experiment theory..."
"The locals seem to be suffering from symptoms that resemble
"Then we are seeing vivid dreams every night and the city has
this ethereal feel to it... That makes me think of hallucinogens."
"It's not exactly public knowledge, but a year ago I was investigating
a scoop that involved the Allied countries..."
"The Kingdom of Rondon and Valland had their highest army officials
gathered on a remote island hundreds of kilometers from the coastline
"They had a new kind of experimental weapon ready for war. It was
"A ridiculously big bomb in other words. One that created a crater
"Obviously the thing totally demolished the island it was used on,
but what made the bomb even more terrifying and vile was that the
plutonium used in the bomb left the area radiated."
"The wildlife near the island suffered greatly from the nuclear
radiation. Many of the animals had similar-ish symptoms you see here
"Radiation poisoning and burns, the most drastic effects were
"You think a similar bomb was detonated here?"
"Science can't explain the things happening here."
"You think a similar bomb was detonated here?"
"No, no, not at all. This place would be far more wrecked if that
"I'm just thinking that Bremen and Eastern Union must be aware of
the weapon the Allied countries have at their disposal."
"Whatever is happening here, could be an alternative to that."
"Somekind of a new weapon Bremen snuck from the Eastern Union
"Why else see all the effort getting to this small town in the
"Why wasn't the Allied weapon ever used in war?"
"Why wasn't the Allied weapon ever used in war?"
"You don't need to shoot your gun when robbing a bank. It's enough
if you just point the thing."
"You must have noticed that neither Bremen nor Eastern Union tried
to expand their borders towards west for a good while now."
"I don't have all the puzzle pieces yet... There is something more
to this. Something that causes all the dreams and drives people to
"Science can't explain the things happening here."
"Sure, go ahead and believe in your old gods. I just don't think
we have enough common ground to continue this discussion."
"That's still something that I can't quite put my head around."
"Every one of us has seen hallucinations and lucid dreams. From the
looks of things, the locals also suffered from similar problems..."
"I don't know yet. I need to investigate more."
"Not this time buddy. I prefer to work alone."
\c[1]"Things are on the right track again. This place is a big lead."\c[0]
